mapper.select: SELECT ID, title, content, importance, month FROM W_MONTHLY_PLAN WHERE isdelete = '0' AND isCompleted = '0' AND member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY credate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO W_MONTHLY_PLAN( id, member_id, title, content, importance, month, yearly_Plan_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{member_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{importance}, TO_DATE(#{month},'yyyy-mm'), #{yearlyPlan_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, title, content, importance, TO_CHAR(month, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, isCompleted FROM W_MONTHLY_PLAN WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND ID = #{monthlyPlanId} ORDER BY credate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE W_MONTHLY_PLAN SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, importance = #{importance}, month = TO_DATE(#{month},'yyyy-mm') WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND ID = #{id}
